event.doc_name: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement

evidence.text: 7.  The Court hereby re tains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement

add_extracted.value: The Court hereby retains jurisdiction solely for the purposes set forth in the Settlement Agreement.

evidence.text: 2. Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 3, Section IT IS THEREFORE HEREBY ORDERED, Point 2

add_extracted.value: Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is fair, adequate, and reasonable.

evidence.text: 3. Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 3, Section IT IS THEREFORE HEREBY ORDERED, Point 3

add_extracted.value: Pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23(e), the Settlement Agreement is hereby approved.

evidence.text: 4. This action is hereby dismissed with prejudice, subject to the retention of jurisdiction as hereafter provided.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 3, Section IT IS THEREFORE HEREBY ORDERED, Point 4

add_extracted.value: This action is hereby dismissed with prejudice, subject to the retention of jurisdiction as hereafter provided.

evidence.text: 5. Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 3, Section IT IS THEREFORE HEREBY ORDERED, Point 5

add_extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby deemed conclusively to have released the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

evidence.text: 6. Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.
evidence.source_document: Final Order Approving Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 3, Section IT IS THEREFORE HEREBY ORDERED, Point 6

add_extracted.value: Each Settlement Class Member is hereby barred and permanently enjoined from prosecuting, commencing or continuing any of the Released Claims against the Released Parties.

event.doc_name: Co-Neutral Tenth Commentary Issued August 2018: Compromise and Settlement Agreement

evidence.text: Pursuant to the March 5 decision, the Oklahoma Department of Human Services must, among other things, relocate the remaining children currently placed at the Laura Dester Children’s Center in Tulsa, Oklahoma to alternate, safe, needs-based placements by June 30, 2018.
evidence.source_document: Co-Neutral Tenth Commentary Issued August 2018: Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 2, Section ORDERED, ADJUDGED, AND DECREED

add_extracted.value: relocate the remaining children currently placed at the Laura Dester Children’s Center in Tulsa, Oklahoma to alternate, safe, needs-based placements by June 30, 2018

evidence.text: the Co-Neutrals require DHS to cease immediately any new placements at the Laura Dester shelter.
evidence.source_document: Co-Neutral Tenth Commentary Issued August 2018: Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 2, Section ORDERED, ADJUDGED, AND DECREED

add_extracted.value: cease immediately any new placements at the Laura Dester shelter

evidence.text: the Co-Neutrals require that DHS develop and submit to the Co-Neutrals a transition plan by April 1, 2018, to place all children out of the Laura Dester shelter by a date to be determined but not later than June 30, 2018.
evidence.source_document: Co-Neutral Tenth Commentary Issued August 2018: Compromise and Settlement Agreement
evidence.location: Page 2, Section ORDERED, ADJUDGED, AND DECREED

add_extracted.value: develop and submit to the Co-Neutrals a transition plan by April 1, 2018, to place all children out of the Laura Dester shelter by a date to be determined but not later than June 30, 2018
